After a few seconds of silenty zooming in on the killer, a phone suddenly starts vibrating, scaring the group
The killer unexpectedly jumps out of a garbage can
The car’s back camera turns on to reveal the killer standing outside
The camera turns back on to reveal the killer now standing right in front of it
The killer jumps out from the back seat and grabs Phil
